data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Before looking at how a computer does what it does, let us look at what it can do. The ____ of a computer ____ its ____; a computer ____ an ____ device ____ can ____, ____, ____ process ____. Therefore, all of the instructions that we give to the computer relate to storing, retrieving, and processing data.
data.partBlankContent: Before looking at how a computer does what it does, let us look at what it can do. The defin_____ of a computer outl____ its capabi______; a computer i_ an elect_____ device th__ can st___, retr____, a__ process da__. Therefore, all of the instructions that we give to the computer relate to storing, retrieving, and processing data.
data.answer: 在看计算机如何做它所做的事情之前，让我们先看看它能做什么。计算机的定义概括了它的功能;计算机是一种能存储、检索和处理数据的电子设备。因此，我们给计算机的所有指令都与存储、检索和处理数据有关。
